insert into t_custom_property (property_type, property_name, property_field, company_id,remarks,,create_id,create_name,create_date) values (#{propertyType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
